item.title: [Article] [Essentials] 10 Things Software Developers Should Learn about Learning
item.description: 10 Things Software Developers Should Learn about Learning In an industry where constant learning is so important, maybe we should think a little bit about how we’re learning before we spend our lives doing it. Related PDF Version Hacker News Discussion
item.content:encoded:
10 Things Software Developers Should Learn about Learning

In an industry where constant learning is so important, maybe we should think a little bit about how we’re learning before we spend our lives doing it.

  • Hacker News Discussion
